dlcs.name: Curse
dlcs.description:
A lovely stroll in the park becomes a terrible misunderstanding!
Sing with Curse in this chill tune to express your love for your girlfriend.

dlcs.name: SL4SH
dlcs.description: Inside Sonic Gems Collection lies a Malicious AI! Battle it out with SL4SH in this frantic track and avoid his deadly claw swipes!
